name: Novasama Technologies
longDescription: We are building high quality and community-oriented apps for Polkadot & Kusama ecosystem

name: ChaosDAO
shortDescription: Community org with a dedicated internal voting process and multisig for OpenGov referenda
longDescription: ChaosDAO is a community organisation of Polkadot & Kusama natives. Our members are involved with every aspect of the ecosystem, and due to our robust internal governance mechanism, we can make a collective democratic vote to ensure that only referendums that benefit the ecosystem are voted in.
